feed.title: GitHub TypeScript Daily Trending
feed.subtitle: Daily Trending of TypeScript in GitHub

entry.title: deiucanta/chatpad
entry.summary:
Not just another ChatGPT user-interface!

Chatpad AI

Premium quality UI for ChatGPT

Web App & Desktop App

Recently, there has been a surge of UIs for ChatGPT, making it the new "to-do app" that everyone wants to try their hand at. Chatpad sets itself apart with a broader vision - to become the ultimate interface for ChatGPT users.

âš¡ï¸ Free and open source

This app is provided for free and the source code is available on GitHub.

ğŸ”’ Privacy focused

No tracking, no cookies, no bullshit. All your data is stored locally.

âœ¨ Best experience

Crafted with love and care to provide the best experience possible.

Give Feedback

If you have any feature requests or bug reports, go to feedback.chatpad.ai.

Contribute

This is a React.js application. Clone the project, run npm i and npm start and you're good to go.

Credits

  • ToDesktop - A simple way to make your web app into a beautiful desktop app
  • DexieJS - A Minimalistic Wrapper for IndexedDB
  • Mantine - A fully featured React component library

entry.title: enricoros/nextjs-chatgpt-app
entry.summary:
ğŸ’¬ Responsive chat application powered by OpenAI's GPT-4, with response streaming, code highlighting, various presets for developers. Using Next.js, React, Joy.

Next.js ChatGPT ğŸ¤–ğŸ’¬

ğŸš¨ Attention! We're adding cool new features to the app! ğŸš¨ (bare-bones was 466a36)

Welcome to nextjs-chatgpt-app! ğŸ‰ğŸš€ Responsive chat application powered by OpenAI's GPT-4, with chat streaming, code highlighting, code execution, development presets, and more. The app is built using Next.js and TypeScript, and it's designed to be easy to use, customize, and extend. We encourage you to contribute and help improve this project! ğŸ˜Š

Click to fork and run on Vercel, or check out the demo (bring your own API keys).

Features & Roadmap âœ¨

  • Chat with OpenAI's GPT-4 ğŸ§ 
  • System presets (Developer, Scientist, Executive, and ChatGPT) ğŸ­

  • Real-time streaming of AI responses âš¡
  • Cool stuff
    • Syntax highlighting for multiple languages ğŸŒˆ
    • Code execution for TypeScript, JavaScript, and HTML code blocks ğŸ–¥ï¸
    • Drag and drop files to add them to the prompt ğŸ“

  • Dark mode ğŸŒ™
  • User-provided API keys
  • ğŸ‰ NEW Support for GPT 3.5 Turbo ğŸ’¨ - @koganei
  • ğŸ‰ NEW Custom system purpose ğŸ­ - @typpo
  • ğŸ‰ NEW Voice input ğŸ™ï¸ - @koganei
  • Developer-oriented features
  • Stop generation
  • Mobile app (PWA)
  • Add your idea in the issues!

Why this? ğŸ’¡

Because the official Chat is slower than the API, and the Playground UI doesn't even highlight code.

Developing ğŸš€

Tech Stack ğŸ› ï¸

Simply clone the repository, install the dependencies, and run the development server:

git clone https://github.com/enricoros/nextjs-chatgpt-app.git
cd nextjs-chatgpt-app
npm install
npm run dev

Now the app should be running on http://localhost:3000.

Contributing ğŸ™Œ

The source code is Very Simpleâ„¢ ğŸ˜€. We'd love to have you contribute to this project! Feel free to fork the repository, make changes, and submit a pull request. If you have any questions or need help, feel free to reach out to us.

This project is licensed under the MIT License.

Made with ğŸ’™
